text: 4.10: Sng 36.6; 1 Ko 4.11-12; 1 T 2.3-4Zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki Fhe Bakɨme, ana taagiap za kha gumgi gu mbigi ndi guma ma. Nza ana khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, ana guigira taagiap nza ndi. Nza guigira ana khothɨgap, anan rargap ki, ana guigira tɨvir vhuuin nza mbuim, nza maaŋ muuŋgiap zazera ŋaara mbatɨga mbui.
